posts.post_content:
WTB 1910 Obak 175 Series Sacramento players: Briggs, Perry, Raymer & Whalen. Help me complete the Sacramento team and reunite these ghosts with their teammate, my great-grandfather, pitcher Spider Baum.

Always interested in Baum cards of any type as well.

Please email scans to [url]mmorris@sacbee.com[/url]
